subject: RE: [junit] Re: 4.5 release candidate
msgSnippet: Johannes, I apologize for not getting back to you sooner about this. I ll make you a deal. I ll put the method back in if you supply the unit test for it. (I
messageBody:
Johannes,

I apologize for not getting back to you sooner about this. I'll make you a
deal. I'll put the method back in if you supply the unit test for it. (I
looked at it and couldn't think of how to test it.)

CVS head contains a version that includes the missing Suite constructor. Let
me know if it works for you.

Cheers,

Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute

_____

From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
Johannes Link
Sent: Thursday, June 26, 2008 12:24 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Re: 4.5 release candidate



ClasspathSuite still does not compile with RC 2, so I guess I'll have
to live with that.

Johannes






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
